RacialTrait.Description: Kobolds have a +1 natural armor bonus.

RacialTrait.Name: Crafty
RacialTrait.Description: Kobolds gain a +2 racial bonus on Craft (trapmaking), Perception, and Profession (miner) checks. Craft (traps) and Stealth are always class skills for a kobold.

RacialTrait.Name: Weakness
RacialTrait.Description: Light sensitivity.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Kobolds begin play speaking only Draconic. Kobolds with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Beast Bond
RacialTrait.Description: Some kobolds have a talent for training animals and beasts to help them both on and off the battlefield. Kobolds with this racial trait gain a +2 racial bonus on Handle Animal and Ride checks. Handle Animal and Ride are always class skills for them. This

RacialTrait.Name: Dragon-Scaled
RacialTrait.Description: Some kobolds are hatched with scales of such vivid color that their connection to a particular sort of chromatic dragon seems undeniable. Whether this coloration is just a quirk of a stray egg or a trait shared by all the members of a tribe, these kobolds

RacialTrait.Name: Gliding Wings
RacialTrait.Description: Some kobolds are born with wings that, while too weak for actual flying, do allow them to fall at a very slow and safe pace. A kobold with wings can use them to glide. It can make a DC 15 Fly check to fall safely from any height without taking falling dam

RacialTrait.Name: Jester
RacialTrait.Description: Some kobolds swallow their pride and survive by groveling, placating, and amusing the powerful. Kobolds with this racial trait gain a +2 racial bonus on Diplomacy and Perform checks. Diplomacy and Perform are always class skills for them. This racial trai

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: Merfolk are graceful, hale, and beautiful. +2 Dexterity, +2 Constitution, +2 Charisma

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Merfolk are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Slow Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Merfolk have a base speed of 5 feet. They have a swim speed of 50 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Aquatic
RacialTrait.Description: Merfolk are humanoids with the aquatic subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Amphibious
RacialTrait.Description: Merfolk are amphibious, but prefer not to spend long periods out of the water.

RacialTrait.Name: Low-Light Vision
RacialTrait.Description: Merfolk have low-light vision.

RacialTrait.Name: Armor
RacialTrait.Description: Merfolk have a +2 natural armor bonus.

RacialTrait.Name: Legless
RacialTrait.Description: Merfolk have no legs, and cannot be tripped.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Merfolk begin play speaking Common and Aquan. Merfolk with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Darkvision
RacialTrait.Description: Some merfolk favor the lightless depths over shallower waters. Merfolk with this racial trait gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet and light sensitivity. This racial trait replaces low-light vision.

RacialTrait.Name: Seasinger
RacialTrait.Description: The beautiful voices of the merfolk are legendary. A seasinger gains a +2 racial bonus on Perform (sing) checks and a +1 racial bonus to the save DC of language-dependent spells. This racial trait replaces low-light vision.

RacialTrait.Name: Strongtail
RacialTrait.Description: A few merfolk have broad, strong tails that are more suited for land travel than the typical merfolk tail. Merfolk with this racial trait have a land speed of 15 feet and a swim speed of 30 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: Nagaji are strong and have forceful personalities, but tend to ignore logic and mock scholastic pursuits. +2 Strength, +2 Charisma, –2 Intelligence

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Nagaji are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Reptilian
RacialTrait.Description: Nagaji are humanoids with the reptilian subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Nagaji have a base speed of 30 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Low-Light Vision
RacialTrait.Description: Nagaji can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

RacialTrait.Name: Armored Scales
RacialTrait.Description: Nagaji have a +1 natural armor bonus from their scaly flesh.

RacialTrait.Name: Resistant
RacialTrait.Description: Nagaji receive a +2 racial saving throw bonus against mind-affecting effects and poison.

RacialTrait.Name: Serpent's Sense
RacialTrait.Description: Nagaji receive a +2 racial bonus on Handle Animal checks against reptiles, and a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Nagaji begin play speaking Common and Draconic. Nagaji with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: +4 Strength, –2 Intelligence, –2 Wisdom, –2 Charisma Orcs are brutal and savage.

RacialTrait.Name: Orc
RacialTrait.Description: Orcs are humanoids with the orc subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Orcs are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Orcs have a base speed of 30 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Darkvision
RacialTrait.Description: Orcs can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Light Sensitivity
RacialTrait.Description: Orcs are dazzled in areas of bright sunlight or within the radius of a daylight spell.

RacialTrait.Name: Ferocity
RacialTrait.Description: Orcs can remain conscious and continue fighting even if their hit point totals fall below 0. Orcs are still staggered at 0 hit points or lower and lose 1 hit point each round as normal.

RacialTrait.Name: Weapon Familiarity
RacialTrait.Description: Orcs are always proficient with greataxes and falchions, and treat any weapon with the word orc in its name as a martial weapon.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Orcs begin play speaking Common and Orc. Orcs with high Intelligence scores can chose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Dayrunner
RacialTrait.Description: Orcs refuse to yield to any foe, including the sun. Some spend hour upon hour glaring at the sun until their ruined eyes acclimatize to bright light. Orcs with this racial trait take a –2 penalty on all ranged attack rolls. This racial trait replaces ligh

RacialTrait.Name: Feral
RacialTrait.Description: Orcs have the ability to fend for themselves long before they master the rudiments of their language and culture. Having needed to hunt bugs and tiny animals for food to survive while still infants, feral orcs fight all the harder to survive when at the b

RacialTrait.Name: Smeller
RacialTrait.Description: Orcs with this racial trait gain a limited scent ability with half the normal range. This racial trait replaces ferocity and weapon familiarity.

RacialTrait.Name: Squalid
RacialTrait.Description: Some orcs exist in surroundings so filthy and pestilent that even other orcs would have difficulty living in them. Orcs with this racial trait gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws made to resist nausea, the sickened condition, and disease. This racial

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: +2 Strength, +2 Wisdom, –2 Charisma Oreads are strong, solid, stable, and stoic.

RacialTrait.Name: Native Outsider
RacialTrait.Description: Oreads are outsiders with the native subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Oreads are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Slow Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Oreads have a base speed of 20 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Darkvision
RacialTrait.Description: Oreads can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Spell-Like Ability
RacialTrait.Description: Magic stone 1/day (caster level equals the oread's total level).

RacialTrait.Name: Energy Resistance Oread
RacialTrait.Description: Oreads have acid resistance 5.

RacialTrait.Name: Earth Affinity
RacialTrait.Description: Oread sorcerers with the elemental (earth) bloodline treat their Charisma score as 2 points higher for all sorcerer spells and class abilities. Oread clerics with the Earth domain use their domain powers and spells at +1 caster level.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Oreads begin play speaking Common and Terran. Oreads with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Crystalline Form
RacialTrait.Description: Oreads with this trait gain a +2 racial bonus to AC against rays thanks to their reflective crystalline skin. In addition, once per day, they can deflect a single ray attack targeted at them as if they were using the Deflect Arrows feat. This racial trait

RacialTrait.Name: Earth Insight
RacialTrait.Description: Oread spellcasters sometimes find that their elemental heritage makes creatures of earth more willing to serve them. Summon monster and summon nature's ally spells that such oreads cast last 2 rounds longer than normal when used to summon creatures with t

RacialTrait.Name: Ferrous Growth
RacialTrait.Description: Oreads with this racial trait learn how to mimic the magic of their shaitan ancestors. Once per day, such an oread can cause a touched piece of nonmagical iron or steel to grow into an object up to 10 pounds in weight, such as a sword, crowbar, or light s

RacialTrait.Name: Fertile Soil
RacialTrait.Description: Oread sorcerers with the verdant bloodline treat their Charisma score as 2 points higher for all sorcerer spells and class abilities. Oread clerics with the Plant domain use their domain powers and spells at +1 caster level. This racial trait replaces ear

RacialTrait.Name: Granite Skin
RacialTrait.Description: Rocky growths cover the skin of oreads with this racial trait. They gain a +1 racial bonus to natural armor. This racial trait replaces energy resistance.

RacialTrait.Name: Mountain-Born
RacialTrait.Description: Oreads are drawn to mountains and other high places, and after many generations they've grown well suited to their environment. Oreads with this racial trait gain a +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics checks made to cross narrow ledges and on saves against alti

RacialTrait.Name: Stone in the Blood
RacialTrait.Description: Oreads with this racial trait mimic the healing abilities of the mephits, gaining fast healing 2 for 1 round anytime they are subject to acid damage (the acid damage does not need to overcome the oread's resistances or immunities to activate this ability)

RacialTrait.Name: Treacherous Earth
RacialTrait.Description: Once per day, an oread with this racial trait can will the earth to rumble and shift, transforming a 10-foot-radius patch of earth, unworked stone, or sand into an area of difficult terrain, centered on an area the oread touches. This lasts for a number o

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings are agile and hearty yet slightly weak.

RacialTrait.Name: Fey
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings are of the Fey subtype

RacialTrait.Name: Small
RacialTrait.Description: Quickling are Small and gain a +1 size bonus to their AC, a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, a –1 penalty on combat maneuver checks and to their CMD, and a +4 size bonus on Stealth checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Supernatural Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings have a base speed of 120 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Slow Susceptability
RacialTrait.Description: Ratfolk gain a +4 racial bonus on Handle Animal checks made to influence rodents.

RacialTrait.Name: Evasion
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings speed provides them evasion.

RacialTrait.Name: Uncanny Dodge
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings speed provides them Uncanny Dodge.

RacialTrait.Name: Sneak Attack
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings can use sneak attack with a +1d6 damage.

RacialTrait.Name: Concealment
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings speed provides them 20 percent miss chance.

RacialTrait.Name: Natural Invisibility
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings are invisible when motionless for 1 round.

RacialTrait.Name: Mobility
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings earn a free feat of Mobility

RacialTrait.Name: Spring Attack
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings earn a free feat of Spring Attack.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings begin play speaking Common, Aklo, and Sylvan.

RacialTrait.Name: Low-Light Vision
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Cold Iron DR5
RacialTrait.Description: Quicklings have DR5/Cold Iron.

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: Ratfolk are agile and clever, yet physically weak, +2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence, –2 Strength.

RacialTrait.Name: Ratfolk
RacialTrait.Description: Ratfolk are humanoids with the ratfolk subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Small
RacialTrait.Description: Ratfolk are Small and gain a +1 size bonus to their AC, a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, a –1 penalty on combat maneuver checks and to their CMD, and a +4 size bonus on Stealth checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Slow Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Ratfolk have a base speed of 20 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Darkvision
RacialTrait.Description: Ratfolk can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Rodent Empathy
RacialTrait.Description: Ratfolk gain a +4 racial bonus on Handle Animal checks made to influence rodents.

RacialTrait.Name: Swarming
RacialTrait.Description: Ratfolk are used to living and fighting communally, and are adept at swarming foes for their own gain and their foes' detriment. Up to two ratfolk can share the same square at the same time. If two ratfolk in the same square attack the same foe, they are

RacialTrait.Name: Tinker
RacialTrait.Description: Ratfolk gain a +2 racial bonus on Craft (alchemy), Perception, and Use Magic Device checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Ratfolk begin play speaking Common. Ratfolk with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Cornered Fury
RacialTrait.Description: Ratfolk can fight viciously when cut off from friends and allies. Whenever a ratfolk with this racial trait is reduced to half or fewer of his hit points, and has no conscious ally within 30 feet, he gains a +2 racial bonus on melee attack rolls and to Ar

RacialTrait.Name: Scent
RacialTrait.Description: Some ratfolk have much more strongly developed senses of smell, instead of keen eyes and ears. These ratfolk have the scent ability, but take a –2 penalty on all Perception checks based primarily on sight or hearing. This racial trait replaces tinker.

RacialTrait.Name: Skulk
RacialTrait.Description: Some ratfolk can blend easily into their environments, and move with surprising grace. Ratfolk gain a +2 racial bonus on Stealth checks, and take only a –5 penalty on Stealth checks made to hide from creatures they have distracted with a Bluff check (rath

RacialTrait.Name: Unnatural
RacialTrait.Description: Some ratfolk unnerve normal animals, and train to defend themselves against the inevitable attacks from such creatures. These ratfolk take a –4 penalty on all Charisma-based skill checks to affect creatures of the animal type, and receive a +2 dodge bonus

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: Samsarans are insightful and strong-minded, but their bodies tend to be frail. +2 Intelligence, +2 Wisdom, –2 Constitution

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Samsarans are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Samsarans have a base speed of 30 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Low-Light Vision
RacialTrait.Description: Samsarans can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

RacialTrait.Name: Lifebound
RacialTrait.Description: Samsarans gain a +2 racial bonus on all saving throws made to resist death effects, saving throws against negative energy effects, Fortitude saves made to remove negative levels, and Constitution checks made to stabilize if reduced to negative hit points.

RacialTrait.Name: Samsaran Magic
RacialTrait.Description: Samsarans with a Charisma score of 11 or higher gain the following spell-like abilities

RacialTrait.Name: Shards of the Past
RacialTrait.Description: A samsaran's past lives grant her bonuses on two particular skills. A samsaran chooses two skills—she gains a +2 racial bonus on both of these skills, and they are treated as class skills regardless of what class she actually takes.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Samsarans begin play speaking Common and Samsaran. Samsarans with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Mystic Past Life
RacialTrait.Description: You can add spells from another spellcasting class to the spell list of your current spellcasting class. You add a number of spells equal to 1 + your spellcasting class's key ability score bonus (Wisdom for clerics, and so on). The spells must be the same

RacialTrait.Name: Sea Lungs
RacialTrait.Description: The changeling may hold her breath for a number of rounds equal to three times her Constitution before she risks drowning.

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: +2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence, –2 Constitution Sylphs are quick and insightful, but slight and delicate.

RacialTrait.Name: Native Outsider
RacialTrait.Description: Sylphs are outsiders with the native subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Sylphs are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Sylphs have a base speed of 30 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Darkvision
RacialTrait.Description: Sylphs can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Spell-Like Ability
RacialTrait.Description: Feather fall 1/day (caster level equals the sylph's total level).

RacialTrait.Name: Energy Resistance Slyph
RacialTrait.Description: Sylphs have electricity resistance 5.

RacialTrait.Name: Air Affinity
RacialTrait.Description: Sylph sorcerers with the elemental (air) bloodline treat their Charisma score as 2 points higher for all sorcerer spells and class abilities. Sylph spellcasters with the Air domain use their domain powers and spells at +1 caster level.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Sylphs begin play speaking Common and Auran. Sylphs with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Air Insight
RacialTrait.Description: Sylph spellcasters sometimes find that their elemental heritage makes creatures of air more willing to serve them. Summon monster and summon nature's ally spells that the sylph casts last 2 rounds longer than normal when used to summon creatures with the

RacialTrait.Name: Breeze-Kissed
RacialTrait.Description: Breezes seem to follow most sylphs wherever they go, but some sylphs are better able to control these winds than others. A sylph with this racial trait surrounds herself with swirling winds, gaining a +2 racial bonus to AC against nonmagical ranged attack

RacialTrait.Name: Like the Wind
RacialTrait.Description: A sylph with this racial trait gains a +5 foot bonus to her base speed. This racial trait replaces energy resistance.

RacialTrait.Name: Sky Speaker
RacialTrait.Description: Sylphs with this racial trait feel kinship toward the creatures of the air, and can use speak with animals once per day to speak to birds or other flying animals. Her caster level for these effects is equal to her level. This racial trait replaces the syl

RacialTrait.Name: Storm in the Blood
RacialTrait.Description: A sylph with this racial trait gains fast healing 2 for 1 round anytime she takes electricity damage (whether or not this electricity damage gets through her electricity resistance). The sylph can heal up to 2 hit points per level per day with this abilit

RacialTrait.Name: Thunderous Resilience
RacialTrait.Description: Sylphs with this racial trait gain sonic resistance 5. This racial trait replaces energy resistance.

RacialTrait.Name: Weather Savvy
RacialTrait.Description: Some sylphs are so in tune with the air and sky that they can sense the slightest change in atmospheric conditions. Sylphs with this trait can spend a full-round action to predict the weather in an area for the next 24 hours. The sylph's prediction is alw

RacialTrait.Name: Whispering Wind
RacialTrait.Description: Some sylphs are especially thin and wispy, as though they were made more of air than flesh. Sylphs with this racial trait gain a +4 racial bonus on Stealth checks. This racial trait replaces the sylph's spell-like ability racial trait.

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: Strix are swift and elusive, but tend to be stubborn and swift to anger. +2 Dexterity, -2 Charisma

RacialTrait.Name: Strix
RacialTrait.Description: Strix are humanoids with the strix subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Strix are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Strix have a base speed of 30 feet on land. They also have a fly speed of 60 feet (average).

RacialTrait.Name: Low-Light Vision
RacialTrait.Description: Strix can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

RacialTrait.Name: Darkvision
RacialTrait.Description: Strix can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Hatred
RacialTrait.Description: Strix receive a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures with the human subtype because of their special training against these hated foes.

RacialTrait.Name: Nocturnal
RacialTrait.Description: Strix gain a +2 racial bonus on Perception and Stealth checks in dim light or darkness.

RacialTrait.Name: Suspicious
RacialTrait.Description: Strix receive a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against illusion spells and effects.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Strix begin play speaking Strix. Those with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Dayguard
RacialTrait.Description: Familiar with watching over its tribe during the day, the strix gains a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks and treats Perception as a class skill. This racial trait replaces nocturnal.

RacialTrait.Name: Frightening
RacialTrait.Description: The strix looks particularly menacing and use this to its advantage, gaining a +2 racial bonus on Intimidate checks. This racial trait replaces nocturnal.

RacialTrait.Name: NimbleStrix
RacialTrait.Description: The strix receives a +1 racial bonus on Reflex saves. This replaces the suspicious racial trait.

RacialTrait.Name: Tough
RacialTrait.Description: The strix receives a +1 racial bonus on Fortitude saves. This racial trait replaces suspicious.

RacialTrait.Name: Wing-Clipped
RacialTrait.Description: The flight of wing-clipped strix is weaker than normal, whether from deformity or injury. Their fly speed is 20 feet (poor) instead of the normal fly speed, and they must make a DC 30 Fly check to fly upward. Ostracized by their tribes and forced to deal

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: Sulis are brawny and charming, but slow-witted. +2 Strength, +2 Charisma, –2 Intelligence

RacialTrait.Name: Native Outsider
RacialTrait.Description: Sulis are outsiders with the native subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Sulis are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Sulis have a base speed of 30 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Low-Light Vision
RacialTrait.Description: Sulis can see twice as far as humans in dim light.

RacialTrait.Name: Negotiator
RacialTrait.Description: Sulis are keen negotiators, and gain a +2 racial bonus on Diplomacy and Sense Motive checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Elemental Assault
RacialTrait.Description: Once per day as a swift action, a suli can shroud her arms in acid, cold, electricity, or fire. This lasts for one round per level, and can be dismissed as a free action. Unarmed strikes with her arms or hands (or attacks with weapons held in those hands)

RacialTrait.Name: Energy Resistance 5
RacialTrait.Description: Sulis have resistance to acid 5, cold 5, electricity 5, and fire 5.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.BenefitValue: Common and one elemental language (Aquan#Auran, Ignan#elemental language (Aquan, Auran, Ignan, or Terran)
RacialTrait.Description: Sulis begin play speaking Common and one elemental language (Aquan, Auran, Ignan, or Terran). Sulis with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Energy Strike
RacialTrait.Description: A suli with this racial trait has a stronger connection to one energy type than to the other three used by sulis. Choose one energy type

RacialTrait.Name: Earthfoot
RacialTrait.Description: Whenever the suli moves through difficult terrain related to earth and stone (rubble, mud, sand, and so on), she may move through 5 feet of that difficult terrain each round as if it were normal terrain. This allows the suli to take a 5-foot step into tha

RacialTrait.Name: Firehand
RacialTrait.Description: Instead of adding damage to a melee attack, the suli may hurl a piece of her arm-flames as if it were a thrown weapon. The suli makes a ranged touch attack; if the attack hits, the target takes 1d6 points of fire damage. The flames have a range increment

RacialTrait.Name: Icewalk
RacialTrait.Description: The suli can walk on water-based liquids as if using water walk, except instead of hovering above the surface, she creates a temporary layer of ice that supports her and immediately melts once she moves away from it. This ice is not slippery to the suli a

RacialTrait.Name: Shockshield
RacialTrait.Description: Once per round as an immediate action, the suli can shock a creature that touches or attacks her with a natural attack, unarmed strike, or metal melee weapon, dealing 1d6 points of electricity damage to the creature.

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin are fast and observant but relatively weak and emotionally distant. –2 Strength, +2 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom, –4 Charisma

RacialTrait.Name: Gnome
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin are humanoids with the gnome subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Small
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin are Small creatures and gain a +1 size bonus to their AC, a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, a –1 penalty to their CMB and CMD, and a +4 size bonus on Stealth checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Defensive Training
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin gain a +2 dodge bonus to Armor Class.

RacialTrait.Name: SensesSvirfneblin
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin have darkvision 120 ft. and low-light vision.

RacialTrait.Name: Fortunate
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin gain a +2 racial bonus on all saving throws.

RacialTrait.Name: SkilledSvirfneblin
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin gain a +2 racial bonus on Stealth checks; this improves to a +4 bonus underground. They gain a +2 racial bonus on Craft (alchemy) checks and Perception checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Hatred
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin receive a +1 bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures of the reptilian and dwarven subtypes due to training against these hated foes.

RacialTrait.Name: Stonecunning
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin gain stonecunning as dwarves.

RacialTrait.Name: Spell Resistance Svirfneblin
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin have SR equal to 11 + their class levels.

RacialTrait.Name: Svirfneblin Magic
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin add +1 to the DC of any illusion spells they cast. Svirfneblin also gain the following spell-like abilities

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin begin play speaking Gnome and Undercommon. Those with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Healthy
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin gain a +4 bonus on Fortitude saves against disease and poison, including magical diseases. This racial trait replaces fortunate.

RacialTrait.Name: Stoneseer
RacialTrait.Description: Svirfneblin add +1 to the caster level of any spells with the earth descriptor they cast. Svirfneblin also gain the following spell-like abilities

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: +2 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom, –2 Constitution Tengus are fast and observant, but relatively fragile and delicate.

RacialTrait.Name: Tengu
RacialTrait.Description: Tengus are humanoids with the tengu subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Tengus are Medium creatures and receive no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Tengus have a base speed of 30 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Low-Light Vision
RacialTrait.Description: Tengus have low-light vision.

RacialTrait.Name: Sneaky
RacialTrait.Description: Tengus gain a +2 racial bonus on Perception and Stealth checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Gifted Linguist
RacialTrait.Description: Tengus gain a +4 racial bonus on Linguistics checks, and learn 2 languages each time they gain a rank in Linguistics rather than 1 language.

RacialTrait.Name: Swordtrained
RacialTrait.Description: Tengus are trained from birth in swordplay, and as a result are automatically proficient with swordlike weapons (including bastard swords, daggers, elven curve blades, falchions, greatswords, kukris, longswords, punching daggers, rapiers, scimitars, short

RacialTrait.Name: Natural Weapon
RacialTrait.Description: A tengu has a bite attack that deals 1d3 points of damage.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Tengus begin play speaking Common and Tengu. Tengus with high Intelligence scores can choose any languages they want (except for secret languages, such as Druidic).

RacialTrait.Name: Carrion Sense
RacialTrait.Description: Many tengus have a natural ability to sniff out carrion. While their sense of smell isn't as keen as that of other species, it is particularly attuned to the scent of injuries or death. Tengus with this racial trait have a limited scent ability, which onl

RacialTrait.Name: Claw Attack
RacialTrait.Description: Tengus with this racial trait have learned to use their claws as natural weapons. They gain two claw attacks as primary natural attacks that deal 1d3 points of damage, and are treated as having the Improved Unarmed Strike feat for the purpose of qualifyin

RacialTrait.Name: Exotic Weapon Training
RacialTrait.Description: Instead of swords, some tengus are trained in exotic weaponry. Such tengus choose a number of eastern weapons equal to 3 + their Intelligence bonus, and gain proficiency with these weapons. This racial trait replaces swordtrained.

RacialTrait.Name: Glide
RacialTrait.Description: Some tengus can use their feathered arms and legs to glide. Tengus with this racial trait can make a DC 15 Fly check to fall safely from any height without taking falling damage, as if using feather fall. When falling safely, a tengu may make an additiona

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: +2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence, –2 Charisma Tieflings are quick in body and mind, but are inherently strange and unnerving.

RacialTrait.Name: Native Outsider
RacialTrait.Description: Tieflings are outsiders with the native subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Tieflings are Medium creatures and receive no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Tieflings have a base speed of 30 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Darkvision
RacialTrait.Description: Tieflings see in the dark for up to 60 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Skilled
RacialTrait.Description: Tieflings gain a +2 racial bonus on Bluff and Stealth checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Spell-Like Ability
RacialTrait.Description: Tieflings can use darkness once per day as a spell-like ability. The caster level for this ability equals the tiefling's class level.

RacialTrait.Name: Fiendish Resistance
RacialTrait.Description: Tieflings have cold resistance 5, electricity resistance 5, and fire resistance 5.

RacialTrait.Name: Fiendish Sorcery
RacialTrait.Description: Tiefling sorcerers with the Abyssal or Infernal bloodlines treat their Charisma score as 2 points higher for all sorcerer class abilities.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Tieflings begin play speaking Common and either Abyssal or Infernal. Tieflings with high intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Beguiling Liar
RacialTrait.Description: Many tieflings find that the best way to get along in the world is to tell others what they want to hear. These tieflings' practice of telling habitual falsehoods grants them a +4 racial bonus on Bluff checks to convince an opponent that what they are say

RacialTrait.Name: Fiendish Sprinter
RacialTrait.Description: Some tieflings have feet that are more bestial than human. Whether their feet resemble those of a clawed predator or are the cloven hooves common to many of their kind, tieflings with this trait gain a 10-foot racial bonus to their speed when using the ch

RacialTrait.Name: Maw or Claw
RacialTrait.Description: Some tieflings take on the more bestial aspects of their fiendish ancestors. These tieflings exhibit either powerful, toothy maws or dangerous claws. The tiefling can choose a bite attack that deals 1d6 points of damage or two claws that each deal 1d4 poi

RacialTrait.Name: Prehensile Tail
RacialTrait.Description: Many tieflings have tails, but some have long, flexible tails that can be used to carry items. While they cannot wield weapons with their tails, they can use them to retrieve small, stowed objects carried on their persons as a swift action. This racial tr

RacialTrait.Name: Scaled Skin
RacialTrait.Description: The skin of these tieflings provides some energy resistance, but is also as hard as armor. Choose one of the following energy types

RacialTrait.Name: Soul Seer
RacialTrait.Description: Rare tieflings have a peculiar sight that allows them to see the state of a creature's soul. They can use deathwatch at will as spell-like ability. This racial trait replaces the spell-like ability and fiendish sorcery racial traits.

RacialTrait.Name: Vestigial Wings
RacialTrait.Description: Some tieflings possess a pair of undersized, withered, or stunted wings like a mockery of those of their fiendish forbearer. Sometimes these wings are leathery, like those of a bat. Other times they are covered with a scattering of black, red, or violet f

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: +2 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom, –2 Strength Undines are both perceptive and agile, but tend to adapt rather than match force with force.

RacialTrait.Name: Native Outsider
RacialTrait.Description: Undines are outsiders with the native subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Undines are Medium creatures and receive no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Undines have a base speed of 30 feet on land. They also have a swim speed of 30 feet, can move in water without making Swim checks, and always treat Swim as a class skill.

RacialTrait.Name: Darkvision
RacialTrait.Description: Undines can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Spell-Like Ability
RacialTrait.Description: Hydraulic push 1/day (caster level equals the undine's level).

RacialTrait.Name: Energy Resistance Undine
RacialTrait.Description: Undines have cold resistance 5.

RacialTrait.Name: Water Affinity
RacialTrait.Description: Undine sorcerers with the elemental (water) bloodline treat their Charisma score as 2 points higher for all sorcerer spells and class abilities. Undine clerics with the Water domain cast their Water domain powers and spells at +1 caster level.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Undines begin play speaking Common and Aquan. Undines with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Acid Breath
RacialTrait.Description: Undines whose outsider heritage can be traced to a water mephit can wield acid as a weapon. Such an undine has a breath weapon that is a 5-foot cone of acidic water usable once per day. The breath deals 1d8 points of acid damage per two character levels (

RacialTrait.Name: Amphibious
RacialTrait.Description: Some undines are born with a permanent bond to water. Undines with this racial trait gain the aquatic subtype and amphibious special quality. This racial trait replaces the spell-like ability racial trait.

RacialTrait.Name: Deepsight
RacialTrait.Description: The eyes of some undines are especially adapted to the lightless depths of the oceans, but not to air-filled environments. An undine with this racial trait has darkvision 120 feet when underwater, but otherwise has no darkvision at all. This racial trait

RacialTrait.Name: Flesh Chameleon
RacialTrait.Description: Some undines can change their coloration to match human skin tones. As a standard action, an undine with this racial trait can change her natural blue hue to match any normal human skin tone, and can revert to normal as a free action. This grants a +4 rac

RacialTrait.Name: Hydrated Vitality
RacialTrait.Description: An undine with this racial trait gains fast healing 2 for 1 round anytime she submerges completely within a body of natural salt water, fresh water, or brackish water. Stagnant, poisoned, or trapped water (such as an artificial pit or a bag of holding) do

RacialTrait.Name: Nereid Fascination
RacialTrait.Description: Some undines can trace their ancestry to nereids as well as to outsiders. Once per day as a standard action, such an undine can create a 20-foot-radius aura that causes humanoids within the aura's range to become fascinated with her for a number of rounds

RacialTrait.Name: Ooze Breath
RacialTrait.Description: Some undines' outsider heritage can be traced to ooze mephits. These undines have a breath weapon that is a 5-foot cone of slime usable once per day. The slime deals 1d4 points of acid damage per two character levels (maximum 5d4) and sickens creatures in

RacialTrait.Name: Terrain Chameleon
RacialTrait.Description: Some undines can change their coloration to blend in with underwater terrain, mixing browns, grays, and greens to resemble kelp or other natural water plants. As a standard action, an undine with this racial trait can change her coloration, gaining a +4 b

RacialTrait.Name: Water Sense
RacialTrait.Description: Undines with this racial trait can sense vibrations in water, granting them blindsense 30 feet against creatures in contact with the same body of water. This racial trait replaces energy resistance.

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: +2 Dexterity, +2 Wisdom, –2 Charisma. Vanaras are agile and insightful, but are also rather mischievous.

RacialTrait.Name: Vanara
RacialTrait.Description: Vanaras are humanoids with the vanara subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Vanaras are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Vanaras have a base speed of 30 feet and a Climb speed of 30 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Low-Light Vision
RacialTrait.Description: A vanara can see twice as far as a human in dim light.

RacialTrait.Name: Nimble
RacialTrait.Description: Vanaras have a +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics and Stealth checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Prehensile Tail
RacialTrait.Description: A vanara has a long, flexible tail that she can use to carry objects. She cannot wield weapons with her tail, but the tail allows her to retrieve a small, stowed object carried on her person as a swift action.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Vanaras begin play speaking Common and Vanaran. Vanaras with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following Aklo, Celestial, Elven, Gnome, Goblin, and Sylvan.

RacialTrait.Name: Tree Stranger
RacialTrait.Description: Some vanaras have spent their lives among humans in centers of learning instead of traditional treetop homes. These vanaras treat all Knowledge skills as class skills, but lose their climb speed racial trait.

RacialTrait.Name: Whitecape
RacialTrait.Description: The rare whitecape vanara clans have more in common with savanna-dwelling baboons than the jungle-dwelling monkeys that most vanaras resemble. Their stooping build grants them a +4 racial bonus to CMD when resisting a bull rush or trip. These vanaras usua

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: Vishkanyas are graceful and elegant, but they are often irrational. +2 Dexterity, +2 Charisma, –2 Wisdom

RacialTrait.Name: Vishkanya
RacialTrait.Description: Vishkanyas are humanoids with the vishkanya subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Vishkanyas are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Vishkanyas have a base speed of 30 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Low-Light Vision
RacialTrait.Description: Vishkanyas can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.

RacialTrait.Name: Keen Senses
RacialTrait.Description: Vishkanyas receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Limber
RacialTrait.Description: Vishkanyas receive a +2 racial bonus on Escape Artist and Stealth checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Poison Resistance
RacialTrait.Description: A vishkanya has a racial bonus on saving throws against poison equal to its Hit Dice.

RacialTrait.Name: Poison Use
RacialTrait.Description: Vishkanyas are skilled in the use of poison and never accidentally poison themselves when using or applying poison.

RacialTrait.Name: Toxic
RacialTrait.Description: A number of times per day equal to his Constitution modifier (minimum 1/day), a vishkanya can envenom a weapon that he wields with his toxic saliva or blood (using blood requires the vishkanya to be injured when he uses this ability). Applying venom in th

RacialTrait.Name: Weapon Familiarity
RacialTrait.Description: Vishkanyas are always proficient with blowguns, kukri, and shuriken.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Vishkanyas begin play speaking Common and Vishkanya. Vishkanyas with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: Aklo, Draconic, Elven, Goblin, Sylvan, and Undercommon.

RacialTrait.Name: Sensual
RacialTrait.Description: You are trained in drawing attention to yourself. You gain a +2 bonus on any one Perform skill. This racial trait replaces keen senses.

RacialTrait.Name: Subtle Appearance
RacialTrait.Description: You have normal (humanlike) eyes, and your beauty is more conventional. You gain a +4 bonus on Disguise checks to look fully human. This racial trait replaces low-light vision.

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: Wayang are nimble and cagey, but their perception of the world is clouded by shadows. +2 Dexterity, +2 Intelligence, –2 Wisdom

RacialTrait.Name: Wayang
RacialTrait.Description: Wayangs are humanoids with the wayang subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Small
RacialTrait.Description: Wayangs are Small creatures and gain a +1 size bonus to their AC, a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, a –1 penalty on their CMB and to CMD, and a +4 size bonus on Stealth checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Slow Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Wayangs have a base speed of 20 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Darkvision
RacialTrait.Description: Wayangs can see in the dark up to 60 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Light and Dark
RacialTrait.Description: Once per day as an immediate action, a wayang can treat positive and negative energy effects as if she were an undead creature, taking damage from positive energy and healing damage from negative energy. This ability lasts for 1 minute once activated.

RacialTrait.Name: Lurker
RacialTrait.Description: Wayangs gain a +2 racial bonus on Perception and Stealth checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Shadow Magic
RacialTrait.Description: Wayangs add +1 to the DC of any saving throws against spells of the shadow subschool that they cast. Wayangs with a Charisma score of 11 or higher also gain the following spell-like abilities

RacialTrait.Name: Shadow Resistance
RacialTrait.Description: Wayangs get a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells of the shadow subschool.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Wayangs begin play speaking Common and Wayang. Wayangs with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following

RacialTrait.Name: Dissolution's Child
RacialTrait.Description: Once per day, you may change your appearance to look as if you were little more than a 4-foot-tall area of shadow. Your physical form still exists and you are not incorporeal—only your appearance changes. This works like invisibility, except it only lasts

RacialTrait.Name: Greater Spell Resistance
RacialTrait.Description: Spell resistance equal to 11 plus level.

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: +2 Dexterity, +2 Charisma, –2 Constitution Drow are nimble and manipulative.

RacialTrait.Name: Elf
RacialTrait.Description: Drow are humanoids with the elf subtype.

RacialTrait.Name: Medium
RacialTrait.Description: Drow are Medium creatures and receive no bonuses or penalties due to their size.

RacialTrait.Name: Normal Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Drow have a base speed of 30 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Superior Darkvision
RacialTrait.Description: Drow can see in the dark up to 120 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Drow Immunities
RacialTrait.Description: Drow are immune to magic sleep effects and gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against enchantment spells and effects.

RacialTrait.Name: Keen Senses
RacialTrait.Description: Drow gain a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Poison Use
RacialTrait.Description: Drow are skilled in the use of poison and never risk accidentally poisoning themselves.

RacialTrait.Name: Spell-Like Abilities
RacialTrait.Description: Drow nobles can cast dancing lights, deeper darkness, faerie fire, feather fall, and levitate each at will, and have detect magic as a constant spell-like ability. A drow noble can also cast divine favor, dispel magic, and suggestion once per day each.

RacialTrait.Name: Light Blindness
RacialTrait.Description: Abrupt exposure to bright light blinds drow for 1 round; on subsequent rounds, they are dazzled as long as they remain in the affected area.

RacialTrait.Name: Weapon Familiarity
RacialTrait.Description: Drow are proficient with the hand crossbow, rapier, and short sword.

RacialTrait.Name: Nimble Attack
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings receive Weapon Finesse as a bonus feat.

RacialTrait.Name: Blue Age Magic
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings gain a +2 racial bonus on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance and a +2 on dispel checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Poison Use
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings are skilled with poison and never risk accidentally poisoning themselves when applying it to weapons.

RacialTrait.Name: Swift As Shadows
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings reduce the penalty for using Steal while moving at full speed by 5, and reduce the Stealh check penalty for sniping by 10

RacialTrait.Name: Stalker
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings always treat Perception and Stealh as class skills.

RacialTrait.Name: Wild Talent
RacialTrait.Description: Most halflings begin play with some psionic ability and may roll once on the Wild Talent table.

RacialTrait.Name: Stats
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings are nimble and strong-willed, but their small stature makes them weaker than other races. They gain +2 Dexterity, +2 Charisma, and –2 Strength.

RacialTrait.Name: Small
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings are Small creatures and gain a +1 size bonus to their AC, a +1 size bonus on attack rolls, a –1 penalty to their Combat Maneuver Bonus and Combat Maneuver Defense, and a +4 size bonus on Stealth checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Slow Speed
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings have a base speed of 20 feet.

RacialTrait.Name: Fearless
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings receive a +2 racial bonus on all saving throws against fear. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by halfling luck.

RacialTrait.Name: Halfling Luck
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings receive a +1 racial bonus on all saving throws.

RacialTrait.Name: Keen Senses
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings receive a +2 racial bonus on Perception skill checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Sure-Footed
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings receive a +2 racial bonus on Acrobatics and Climb skill checks.

RacialTrait.Name: Weapon Familiarity
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings are proficient with slings and treat any weapon with the word “halfling” in its name as a martial weapon.

RacialTrait.Name: Languages
RacialTrait.Description: Halflings begin play speaking Common and Halfling. Halflings with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following
